description: Describes an application details in the network which is capable of sending or receiveing network flows.
title: Network application

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the application

version.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the application last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the application

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering applications, if necessary. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint node ID which this Application is part of.  If not provided, it's assumed to be discovered using other protocols or out of band.

ip_address.description: IP address the application/node is assigned. If not provided, it's assumed to be discovered using other protocols or out of band.

port_address.description: Port for the application (auto = 6004). If not provided, it's assumed to be discovered using other protocols or out of band.

role.description: The role of the application -- sender, receiver, or both.
